content: How should we dispose of gForge tickets that are addressed by vocabulary harmonization and updating of the terminology server? For example GF#19311. This has in august been included in v3 vocab, and now that vocab is in the FHIR terminology server; thus it is solved now in FHIR through no action of mine.
If it's already dealt with, just withdraw it
that works in the one case where I am the submitter... but imagine one where I am not the submitter.
then find it not persuasive with an explanation
Or find it persuasive and then mark it as "applied" with rather than "change required"
I won't be on the call this week
You do appreciate that standing policy is to assign all particularly difficult actions to FMG members that are not present on the call?
standing policy is to ignore action items anyway
Well, there is some truth in that...
